sentence: The ONLY soup I found from this company without MSG . And it tastes absolutely great ! ! ! We eat it a lot ! Healthy and NO MSG !
Love this . I don 't have many stores around me that carry this . Amazon by far has the best deal and love the now foods brand , just means reputable to me . I use this as a sugar substitute .
It is the best TABASCO item I 've ever consumed ! Thank you . It is really a good one , and it has the right balance of spicy . Exactly in the middle .

I have use this salad dressing in USA and love it . I already recommended this product to many friends that travel to USA .
Very almond tasting , actually too strong and almost overpowering . Prefer Trader Vic 's more subtle flavor even if that is so expensive compared to this .

This is a good tasting Japanese Green Tea in a tea bag . Regular loose -leaf is the best , of course , but tea bag is hard to beat for convenience and price . Better choices include K -cup , but pricey . I actually prefer the Begelow Green Tea (tea bag ) slightly better , but that comes 4 servings per sealed foil which gets stale if they are not all used quickly .

These vanilla beans , for the price , are great . Very moist . . .and stay that way . Once I scrape out the beans , I place the pods in my sugar canister . . . .voila ! Vanilla sugar . You will not be disappointed with these vanilla beans .

This is very sweet , and I bought it twice . But it tastes more like crystalized sugar than honey . This is very thick honey . You can 't pour it . Sometimes it hardens , and then it is difficult to spread . I bought fresh honey from a beekeeper , and the beekeeper honey tasted so much better than this one . This honey does not have a strong taste at all . It is just sugary . I prefer a rich honey taste , and this honey does not have that . But this is super -sweet honey , so it is sure to please many people .
entities: does not have a strong taste

sentence: You know Coffee Mate coffee creamer ? Well , this is it , only in prepackaged servings . Easy to take on the go (camping , picnicking , etc ) .
entities: Easy to take on the go

sentence: i wanted a whole -leaf stevia supplement and this was perfect . this is healthier than an extract , i recommend
This is very good to tea . Strong and full of flavor . This company really take pride in their tea and they send it in a beautiful box .
This is a great product and easy to make . Just rinse it off before using . It has a great flavor to it . I just add stock and vegetables to it . It 's very filling .

This is the only canned soup I like . It doesn 't taste like it came out of a can ! I like to add a can of beans to it , some greens (fresh spinach ) , and sometimes frozen peas or frozen mixed veggies . This makes it a hearty meal while still keeping blood sugar from spiking . It 's also wonderful just the way it is , with nothing added .

A great , low calorie protein shake ! I love the gourmet chocolate flavor . I use it after a workout and always look forward to drinking it ! I blend it in my blender with a cup of milk , 2 tablespoons of PB2 (powdered peanut butter ) , and some ice . Makes a delicious 250 calorie protein shake . I compare the flavor to a chocolate peanut butter milkshake .

I don 't like the rough -cut cubes , because it 's hard consistently portion . Some cubes are half the size of others , and none of them are the same size . It 's so much easier to just get a flat or heaping spoonful of granules and avoid the hassle and guesswork .
My dogs love these . I , personally , prefer my chips to have salt . For someone on a salt restricted diet these are pretty tasty .

This tea is not quite as bold as the Yorkshire Gold . It has a more mellow flavor and is delightful . I usually drink 2 cups of the Yorkshire Gold each morning and then brew a cup of this . It 's a nice follow -up after having the Yorkshire Gold . I do allow it to brew for 5 minutes , and it delivers a lovely cup of tea . I drink all my Scottish and the Yorkshire Gold black without adding anything to them . I love the flavor of both just by themselves without anything added to take away from the real flavor of the tea . Happy tea time folks !

Lundberg brown Basmati rice is my favorite brown rice . I use it as a side dish for stir fries and also frequently use it to make "one pot " chicken and rice dishes or bake it in casseroles . I would highly recommend this rice for any dish where you need a longer grain rice that is not too sticky . The only downside to this rice is that it is very expensive . However , it is a high - quality , USA -grown organic rice and I 'm glad that it is available , even if it does bust my grocery budget .

I thought it was ok in my coffee , but it got kinda lost ; however , I added it to my sugarfree coconut chia recipe and loved it ! Recipe 1 can Thai coconut mink 3 T chia seeds English Toffee Sweet Drops to taste . I used about 12 drops . Stir and put in fridge overnight . The chia seeds will swell and thicken the pudding . Enjoy .
and knew what Pho (pronounced Fuh ) actually tasted like , this wouldn 't be it . But it 's not bad for a noodle dish with oriental flavoring .

sentence: I boil 4 cups of water and add oatmeal (proportions are listed on the back of the package ) , cooking it for about 15 minutes . This gives me a week 's worth of breakfasts . You can wrap a half cup or so of oatmeal and freeze each packet . Each morning , take a packet out , dump it in a bowl with raisins or whatever and microwave for a couple minutes . Pour cold organic half -and -half on it and eat a wonderful healthy fiber -filled organic grain in just a few minutes .
entities: You can wrap a half cup or so

sentence: I love green tea , so I am always on the lookout for different varieties . I really like this tea . If you let it steep for a while you get a nice taste of the ginger . This is a great tea to start your morning with or for an afternoon drink .

I have cherry trees and know what a real natural unadulturated cherry tastes like . I will use this up but will NEVER order it again !
A must buy , fresh and tasty . I bought primary to put a pinch in my coffee grounds to brew , I now cannot drink any other type of coffee . The spice is wonderful .

I bought this product for a friend who is undergoing chemo . My husband and I were introduced to Designer Whey when he experienced very low appetite as a result of treatment for cancer ; during his treatment , he used several containers of the whey - -of all the dietary options , I thought this was one of the best . The protein in whey is supposedly very healthy , and the drinks were quite well tolerated by my husband when his appetite was marginal as a result of his treatment .
This does not taste sugarfree . It has a rich creamy flavor and smells so yummy ! Took it to work and co -workers all enjoyed it too . I love this stuff !

Great peanuts and a good Amazon price but beware , these guys are pretty hot ! Do not purchase if you do not like hot , spicy food . Compared to planters 5 Alarm chili peanuts these are quite a bit hotter . Great flavor , just be prepared for a little runny nose as they have some heat .

My father loves the unfrosted pop -tarts , and it used to be that we could find a box or two in our local grocery stores , but no days that are darn near impossible to find . Then I found these on here . I instantly bought them . This is a TON of poptarts . To be exact , 96 poptarts . They came in perfect condition and are quite delicious . It is a nice treat that is super hard to find in stores .

sentence: This is so nice to have . I have celiac disease , and this product works well for me . Xanthan gum doesn 't , but I can easily substitute for it in recipes using the guar gum . Thank you !
i find a lot of the time this type of jerky is dry and at times very stringy , but all in all it makes a very good snack and bonus protein for me since i weight lift

Orville 's bags are 2 . 9oz , cost only 20 % less during an Amazon sale , have nearly the same calories as Bearitos , accept they come 3x more from fat than fiber , and Orville 's has Triple the sodium . Bearitos seems bland , but that 's the whole point of this product . to achieve the best fully popped natural corn without the flavorings , oils , and salt of everything else on the market . If you are looking for something toned down from the fully flavored over salted stuff you buy in the supermarket , then Orville 's is great . But if you want a true minimalist diet popcorn ; this is it . Bearitos also pops up fuller , softer and larger per kernel than Orville 's does , making for an excellent filling snack when you are looking for a great 100 calorie indulgence .

After reviewing product . I was hopefull it would have work according to its ad . So I got excited , bought a case and tried it for myself . In my opinion , im very dissopointed and will not buy again .

sentence: These are the only goji berries that I have tried , so I have nothing to compare them to . They are delicious and add extra nutrition and sweetness to my smoothies . I also like that they are organic .

I had no problem with the product itself , just the taste . These are sort of a tropical flavor , more intense than your usual Fun Dips that are plain cherry or strawberry . I won 't be buying them again due to personal taste preference .

This is good stuff . Personally , I do not care if it is 'organic ' or 'fair trade ' and it does taste good . Whole Foods sells this in my area for $ 8 per bag (average price per bag when I bought from Amazon was $4 per bag , current price is $ 5 .60 per bag ) . Alter Ego uses llamas to support their organic farming .

Prince of whales tea is a very simple black tea that can be enjoyed everyday . Earl and lady grey have such floral and potent tastes that I have to rotate them so I don 't get tired of them . This tea is just all around great tea leaves instead of the overwhelming additives to flavor it .

Love it ! Grandkids love it ! And i sure do save money by buying it at Amazon . It is almost twice as much at local healthy store

I drink tea like a fiend . Right before bed , this is definitely my favorite . Very calming . I don 't add anything to my tea . Even if you forget the bag in there it 's still good . Oh and if you love tea as much as I do , get the Melita water kettle . It has a different setting for each type of tea . I guess if you brew it at the wrong temp it makes your tea taste different . Totally a believer after I got this ! It 's awesome ! Happy TEA !

I fell in love with this sanding sugar . I used it to sprinkle on cup cakes for a baby shower and it really adds sparkle ! I also made heart -shaped cookies and used a smaller cookie cutter as a stencil and sprinkled the sanding sugar on them to make a heart -on heart design . I made some joining hearts this way , too . My guests were so dazzled with the glitz of it all and the gorgeous display . I used a lighter pink as well and it really added sparkle . So pleased !

These were a gift to myself for Christmas , I love grapefruit . After reading the reviews I chose the pink grapefruit ones . These are so good , just right tang and sweet , you cannot eat just one ! ! I will be back , with friends , a 5 lb . bag , doesn 't go far ! !

I have tried several different grocery store brand chai teas and this one , in my opinion , is the best tasting / quality of them all . The flavors really come out in this one giving it a " richer " taste , and I really think the organic tastes better than the regular version of this .
Very good and no GMO . All kernels pop and they are crunchy . I pop it in coconut oil or I use a pop corn popper with no oil . It comes out great in both .
Love this ! I add it to my ice tea along with the Tetley tea for a spicy but mild flavor . I buy the decaf and have loved it for years .
Authentic Foods has the best quality products I have used for gluten free baking . Tapioca is used in three of the gluten free baking blends I use . I use it in cookies , pastry , and breads .

I used this product almost daily , especially during the week . I work full time and am currently working on a 2nd Masters degree , therefore , stress rears its ugly head quite a bit in my life right now . This tea does seem to help calm me down when I am feeling stressed . The taste is also better than I expected , which is a bonus .
This coffee is great ! The chicory is a pleasant change from regular coffee . Good morning starter and keeps La on your mind .

Love it . Pour in hot water . Zip it closed . Wait a bit . Eat . Yum . Surprisingly very good ! Handy . Lightweight . Long shelf life . Great for a quick meal when you can 't cook , or the electricity is off . Can 't beat it . I have not tried any of the Mountain House items other than this Beef Stew , so can 't review them , but i think their Beef Stew is a winner .

I don 't use a lot of salt - - so when I do , I want it to be good stuff . This is super . I don 't have to use a lot to get the flavor I want - - just a pinch or two . The flakes are easy to "crush " and that seems to release the flavor . Amazon 's price for this is super , too . The 8 . 5 -oz box lasts a long time for me . Definitely my first choice in salt .
Great taste . This is my go -to now that I can 't find the lemongrass green tea from several years back . I tried a different brand , but it tasted chemically . This does not . Good , good stuff .
